item.title: A "Scroll" Screen
item.dc:creator: @Gazmask Gazmask
item.description:
@Gazmask wrote:

Hello all !
My server is goin’ nicely and stuff , now i’m working on a PK version of my server … since it was quite boring
But now i want a “scroll” to show up when people type ::commands or summit , like in all servers you can do ::players and you get a list of players
Is it this ?

sendFrame126("<Text>", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendFrame126("<Text>", 8145); sendFrame126("<Text>", 8147); sendFrame126("<Text>", 8149); sendFrame126("<Text>", 8151); sendFrame126("<Text>", 8152); sendFrame126("<Text>", 8153); sendFrame126("<Text>", 8154); sendFrame126("<Text>", 8156); sendFrame126("<Text>", 8157); sendFrame126("<Text>", 8158); sendFrame126("<Text>", 8159); sendFrame126("<Text>", 8160); sendFrame126("<Text>", 8161); sendFrame126("<Text>", 8162); sendFrame126("<Text>", 8164); sendFrame126("<Text>", 8165); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream();
And if so , how do i find/know these numbers ?
Example : sendFrame126("", 8165);
And where should i add it ?
Thanks in advance

EDIT : Does anyone have an Object ID List or something ? XD

Read full topic
